Coroner sets December review for Pauline Hanna’s death after Polkinghorne acquittal https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/coroner-sets-december-review-for-pauline-hannas-death-after-polkinghorne-acquittal/UY6XYQ6LGBGY3MKHCSFBNTO6II/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/coroner-sets-december-review-for-pauline-hannas-death-after-polkinghorne-acquittal/UY6XYQ6LGBGY3MKHCSFBNTO6II/ Benjamin PlummerThe review will be held in December 2024 to determine next steps in the coronial inquiry. Wed, 25 Sep 2024 04:14:59 +0000 A review hearing into the death of Pauline Hanna has been set down for December as advised by the Coroner just days after Philip Polkinghorne was acquitted for the murder and manslaughter of his wife. Photo / Michael Craig
